MetricDescription: % systems that have been for processing following certification and accreditation
Target:
X % or higher, 
X % higher than previous period, 
X % increase over a defined period 

Higher is better, ideally 100%
Source: NIST (Archived): SP 800-55, Security Metrics Guide for Information Technology Systems

MetricDescription: % systems that are operating under an Interim Authority to Operate (IATO)
Target:
X or lower, 
X % lower than previous period, 
X % reduction over a defined period 

Lower is better
Source: NIST (Archived): SP 800-55, Security Metrics Guide for Information Technology Systems
